-- Drop the external table if it already exists
IF OBJECT_ID('dbo.AgentsData', 'U') IS NOT NULL
  DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.AgentsData;

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CsvFormatAgents
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',', 
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"', 
        USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = TRUE
    )
);

-- Re-create the external table with all columns as NVARCHAR
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.AgentsData
(
    [Agent Name] NVARCHAR(255),
    [State Abbrevation] NVARCHAR(255),
    [State Name] NVARCHAR(255)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/fadata/processed/staging_agentsdata/agents_data.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyAdlsGen2DataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = CsvFormatAgents
);
